alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, Marion and southern Putnam Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 656 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Flagler Beach to 8 miles west of Anthony. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Ocala, Rainbow Lakes Estates, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Fort McCoy, Salt Springs and Andalusia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Marion; Western Putnam
